pullRequest.title: mgr-cfg: Updated Python definitions for RHEL8 and quoted text comparisons.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?

Updated Python definitions for RHEL8.
Quoted text comparisons as words are not supported anymore.

GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: No functional change.


 DONE


Test coverage

No tests: Tested during automatic build.

Manually tested successfully on CentOS6+, LEAP 15.2, Fedora32+

 DONE

Links

 DONE

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_oracle"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_pgsql"
 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"

nodes.bodyText:
On SLE12 this result in an "unresolvable: nothing provides python2".
Just do this %if for rhel only. At SUSE we have the definition python == python2 .
same as above: just remove the suse_version here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -125,16 +126,24 @@ Obsoletes:      python-%{name} < %{oldversion}
 Provides:       python2-%{oldname} = %{oldversion}
 Obsoletes:      python2-%{oldname} < %{oldversion}
 Requires:       %{name} = %{version}-%{release}
+%if 0%{?suse_version} || 0%{?rhel} >= 8
+Requires:       python2
+%else
 Requires:       python
+%endif
 Requires:       python2-rhn-client-tools >= 2.8.4
 Requires:       rhnlib >= 2.8.3
 Requires:       python2-uyuni-common-libs
 %if 0%{?rhel} && 0%{?rhel} <= 5
 Requires:       python-hashlib
 %endif
+%if 0%{?suse_version} || 0%{?rhel} >= 8
+BuildRequires:  python2

commit.message: SPEC: Updated Python definitions for RHEL8 and quoted text comparisons.
